snippet: Buddhist mobs overran a pair of mosques and set hundreds of homes ablaze in central Myanmar on Tuesday, wounding at least 10 people.
abstract: Buddhist mobs overrun two mosques and set fire to over 100 homes in central Myanmar, killing one person and wounding at least nine other people.
lead_paragraph: Buddhist mobs overran a pair of mosques and set hundreds of homes ablaze in central Myanmar on Tuesday, wounding at least 10 people.

headline.main: Myanmar: Deadly Anti-Muslim Violence Flares Up
headline.print_headline: Myanmar: Deadly Anti-Muslim Violence Flares Up
